annotation.name: Escape Artist
annotation.text:
Credits
Artwork, Design â€“ Costin Chioreanu Bass â€“ È˜erban IonuÈ› Georgescu (tracks: CD-1 to CD-13, DVD-3 to DVD-6) Cameraman [DVD Features Filmed By], Film Editor [DVD Features Edited By], Film Producer [DVD Features Produced By] â€“ È˜erban IonuÈ› Georgescu (tracks: DVD-1, DVD-2, DVD-3 to DVD-6) Drums â€“ Marian MihÄƒilÄƒ (tracks: CD-1 to CD-13, DVD-3 to DVD-6) Engineer [Recording Engineer], Mixed By [Mixing] â€“ Marius Costache (tracks: CD-1 to CD-13, DVD-3 to DVD-6) Engineer [Vocal Recording Engineer] â€“ Oliver VÃ©gh* (tracks: CD-1 to CD-13, DVD-3 to DVD-6) Guitar â€“ Eduard Alexandru DascÄƒlu (tracks: CD-1 to CD-13, DVD-3 to DVD-6) Management â€“ Mihnea Ioan Grecu Management [Booking] â€“ È˜tefan Zaharescu Mastered By â€“ Alan Douches Songwriter [Songs Written By], Performer [Performed By], Producer [Produced By] â€“ White Walls (4) (tracks: CD-1 to CD-13, DVD-3 to DVD-6) Vocals, Lyrics By â€“ Eugen Brudaru (tracks: CD-1 to CD-13, DVD-3 to DVD-6)
Notes Drums and guitars recorded at Next Dog Studio, bass guitar recorded at NoCity Studio, vocals recorded at Luna Recording Studio. Mastered at West West Side Music Management @ X-Lab Solutions Booking @ Mighty Owl Productions Â© & â„— 2013 White Walls
Pacakging: 3 panel cardboard sleeve with clear plastic tray, including a foldout booklet

This [https://musicbrainz.org/doc/Style/Unknown_and_untitled/Special_purpose_artist|Special Purpose Artist] should only be used if no artist of discographic relevance has been attributed to a piece of work.

For some reason, a lot of releases are also listed under [http://musicbrainz.org/artist/8b91414e-6f3f-416e-8f2b-138c74b92635|Dan Gibson].

annotation.name: Artist Partner
annotation.text: '''APG''' ('''''Artist Partner Group''''' & '''''Artist Publishing Group''''') is a modern, independent record label and music publishing group for forward thinking and entrepreneurial artists and songwriters. We are powered by partnership and creativity. Our three arms - Partner, Publishing, and Parametric encompass APG's roster of artists, singles and producers/songwriters.

annotation.name: Artist Partner
annotation.text: '''APG''' ('''''Artist Partner Group''''' & '''''Artist Publishing Group''''') is a modern, independent record label and music publishing group for forward thinking and entrepreneurial artists and songwriters.

annotation.name: Artist Partner Group, Inc.
annotation.text:
imprint history: As a joint venture with [label:66df7a2b-6476-4fcf-97a9-f213f832af80|Atlantic Records] and [label:85010168-8987-4540-a058-296d426c3981|Warner Music Group] 2012 â€”â€” 2020: [label:38814d39-32a1-4ac6-9280-9f0d62ffe9a9|Artist Partner]
In Nov. 2020, APG ended their eight-year joint venture with [label:66df7a2b-6476-4fcf-97a9-f213f832af80|Atlantic Records] to go fully independent. 2020 â€”â€” present: [label:71a9bef2-4e17-4a3f-a9a2-3d70a907c30b|apg]

annotation.name: Artist Partner Group, Inc.
annotation.text:
imprint history:
2012 â€”â€” 2020: [label:38814d39-32a1-4ac6-9280-9f0d62ffe9a9|Artist Partner] Artist Partner Group (APG) was initially established as a joint venture between [label:66df7a2b-6476-4fcf-97a9-f213f832af80|Atlantic Records] and [label:85010168-8987-4540-a058-296d426c3981|Warner Music Group]. During this period, it used the lowercase "'''apg'''" as its imprint. Throughout this phase, APG leveraged the resources and support of both major music companies to focus on artist development and promotion.
2020.11 â€”â€” present: [label:71a9bef2-4e17-4a3f-a9a2-3d70a907c30b|Artist Partner Group] In November 2020, APG ended its eight-year joint venture with Atlantic Records to operate fully independently. It continues to use the lowercase "'''apg'''" as its imprint. This transition marked APG's path toward greater autonomy while retaining and strengthening its brand identity.

annotation.name: Artist Partner Group, Inc.
annotation.text:
imprint history:
2013 â€”â€” 2020: [label:38814d39-32a1-4ac6-9280-9f0d62ffe9a9|Artist Partner] Artist Partner Group (APG) was initially established as a joint venture between [label:66df7a2b-6476-4fcf-97a9-f213f832af80|Atlantic Records] and [label:85010168-8987-4540-a058-296d426c3981|Warner Music Group]. During this period, it used the lowercase "'''apg'''" as its imprint. Throughout this phase, APG leveraged the resources and support of both major music companies to focus on artist development and promotion.
2020.11 â€”â€” present: [label:71a9bef2-4e17-4a3f-a9a2-3d70a907c30b|Artist Partner Group] In November 2020, APG ended its eight-year joint venture with Atlantic Records to operate fully independently. It continues to use the lowercase "'''apg'''" as its imprint. This transition marked APG's path toward greater autonomy while retaining and strengthening its brand identity.

annotation.name: Artist Partner Group, Inc.
annotation.text:
imprint history: As a joint venture with [label:66df7a2b-6476-4fcf-97a9-f213f832af80|Atlantic Records] and [label:85010168-8987-4540-a058-296d426c3981|Warner Music Group] 2012 â€”â€” 2020: [label:38814d39-32a1-4ac6-9280-9f0d62ffe9a9|Artist Partner]
In Nov. 2020, APG ended their eight-year joint venture with [label:66df7a2b-6476-4fcf-97a9-f213f832af80|Atlantic Records] to go fully independent. 2020 â€”â€” present: [label:71a9bef2-4e17-4a3f-a9a2-3d70a907c30b|Artist Partner Group]

annotation.name: Artist Partner Group, Inc.
annotation.text:
imprint history:
2013 â€”â€” 2020: [label:38814d39-32a1-4ac6-9280-9f0d62ffe9a9|Artist Partner] Artist Partner Group (APG) was initially established as a joint venture between [label:66df7a2b-6476-4fcf-97a9-f213f832af80|Atlantic Records] and [label:85010168-8987-4540-a058-296d426c3981|Warner Music Group]. During this period, it used the lowercase "'''apg'''" as its imprint. Throughout this phase, APG leveraged the resources and support of both major music companies to focus on artist development and promotion.
2020.11 â€”â€” present: [label:71a9bef2-4e17-4a3f-a9a2-3d70a907c30b|Artist Partner Group (apg)] In November 2020, APG ended its eight-year joint venture with Atlantic Records to operate fully independently. It continues to use the lowercase "'''apg'''" as its imprint. This transition marked APG's path toward greater autonomy while retaining and strengthening its brand identity.

annotation.name: The Artist in the Ambulance
annotation.text:
Tracks 13 and 14 are bonus tracks for Japan.
Recorded at Salad Days Studios, Beltsville, MD Drums recorded at Bearsville Studios, Bearsville, NY Mixed at Soundtrack Studios, NYC Mastered at Masterdisk, NYC Strings on tracks 1 & 8 recorded at Phase Studios, College Park, MD
US/Japan Booking at Ellis Industries European Booking at Helter Skelter Legal at Davis, Shapiro, Lewitt, Montone & Hayes
We will be donating a portion of the sales of "The Artist in the Ambulance" to the Syrentha J. Savio Endowment.
All songs Â© 2003 Sceptor of Malice Music Recording â„—Â© 2003 The Island Def Jam Music Group Distributed by Victor Entertainment, Inc. Made in Japan STEREO JASRAC IP
